name: getIncomingWebhookByUser
description:
Get all webhooks of a special user.
OauthScopes: READ_CONVERSATIONS, MANAGE_CONVERSATIONS

pagesize.description: Max number of hooks per request. Default is 25

searchpointer.description: Start of search if consequtive call.

$ul: **conversationId**: The conversation where the posts go to
**creationTime**: Milliseconds since 1.1.1900 when the hook was created
**creatorId**: Th e user who created the webhook
**description**: A short plain text to describe the webhook
**modificationTime**: Milliseconds since 1.1.1900 when the hook was modified
**name**: A name to identify the webhook
**status**: Status may be ENABLED or DISABLED. A disabled hook cannot be used
**tenantId**: The tenant where the conversation and users belong to
**url**: The url where the webhokk can be used
**userId**: The user who will occur as author of the posts
